title: Melbourne storm power outage
body:
IN MY PROMOS
STORMS ARE RAGING
POWER GOES OUT
RECONNECTED
THE COMEBACKS ARE REAL
POWER GOES OUT AGAIN
SCREW YOU WEATHER >:|
http://www.unitedenergy.com.au/customers/your-electricity/electricity-outages.aspx

replies.body: You know there's a storm yet you still play, smart...

I believed. I shall no longer believe. Instead I am very bored without any power. 
My dream -> http://www.jobnimbus.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/tumblr_m336glqeNC1r04pibo1_500.jpg
